name: com.toblerone.toolbox
description: Just a personal toolbox with things that can make development easier

samples.description: A few basic examples of how to use custom Events and Variables
A couple of simple scenes showcasing how to use the custom Update Manager
A simple scene that allows spawning and despawning game objects using an Object Pool
A few scenes showing how to use the basic SceneChanger system. Testing should be done by entering play mode from one of the main scenes (SceneA or SceneB)
An empty scene with examples of custom editors or property drawers showcasing the helper functions created
